message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which we believe is worth more than $80 to anyone who appreciates its quality. To start our negotiation, I'm proposing a price of $120 for the product. This reflects our confidence in its value and our commitment to providing exceptional items. Would you like to proceed with this offer?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on your product. However, I am looking for a more affordable option. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $95 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your pricing strategy.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective and respect your budget constraints. In light of that, I would like to propose a counter-counteroffer of $105 for the product. This still allows us to maintain a fair valuation while being more accommodating to your needs. I look forward to your response.

Thank you for your counter-counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to adjust the price. Considering my budget and the value I seek, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $100 for the product. I hope this proposal meets somewhere in the middle and allows us to reach an agreement.
